divs: Sighting DetailsAs given by phone to ASD today. No phone number or -email was provided and there was no caller ID (it said private): The witness stated that she just had to tell someone what she saw but didn't want any further contact. "I am a government employee working in downtown Kansas City, Missouri and when I went to lunch yesterday with two friends I noticed something hovering in the sky above us. It was almost transparent, and had a glow to it. It was a silver craft with a whitish glow around it. There were no lights that I could see but it looked like it was lit up somehow. I stopped and looked at it, and asked my friends if they saw it, too, but they didn't. Then one said, "yea, there is something there, but I can't see what it is." I don't know what that meant. They just wanted to go on to lunch, but I was shocked that I could see this silver disc-shaped UFO but neither one of them could see it even though we were looking in the same location. I figured later on that maybe they just couldn't deal with the strangeness of the situation. I mean, a UFO in the middle of the day in a downtown area? I looked around at other people, but they seemed oblivious to it. I've never seen anything like this and it really has me shaken. I can't give my personal information out because I have a sensitive job."
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There was one other sighting in Kansas City on or around September 27th 2011
Summary: UFO hovering over buildings in downtown Kansas City
